original_text: She doted upon the Assyrians her neighbours, captains and rulers clothed most gorgeously, horsemen riding upon horses, all of them desirable young men.
korean_text: 그가 그의 이웃 앗수르 사람을 연애하였나니 그들은 화려한 의복을 입은 고관과 감독이요 말 타는 자들과 준수한 청년이었느니라

sentences.original_text: She doted upon the Assyrians her neighbours
captains and rulers clothed most gorgeously
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 화려하게 옷을 입은 장군들과 통치자들

sentences.original_text: all of them desirable young men
